short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp™ Web extension to quickly convert voice notes to text, including a bullet point summary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of listening to long voice audio messages on WhatsApp™ Web? With this extension you get a straight forward integration, to get a transcription and summary of a voice note with the click of a button. Try it out!

Completely free to use for a limited time. No data being sold or stored on our servers.
